root.name: X-Zone
root.description: OverviewSet in the bleak future, the defense computers of an entire planet have gone crazy. You must fight them through seven levels with your trusty Super Scope.Face off against walkers and tanks until you face the master computer end boss.Critical ReceptionElectronic Gaming Monthly awarded X-Zone scores of 7,8,8,8 adding, "...the action is non-stop from the start and you really need to keep calm throughout each level. Only patience can win this game, as rockets come at you from every angle!".
